AdvertDef.message: @whi@Racism and Autoing are bannable offences, so don't even think about it!
@gre@%name@whi@, To toggle the PK Menu On or Off, Press F6. =]
@gre@%name@whi@, Please use the forums daily to see all the new info and updates!
@whi@Need help? Use our IRC-Channel feature @ www.RSCEspada.net!
@whi@Want to donate @gre@%name?@whi@, Then contact @yel@Administrator @whi@, Thank you!

@whi@Remember to vote our @yel@RSCEspada@whi@ server as much as you can!
